title: Silver support looking for adc main to climb with !!
body: Hey guys just looking for a duo partner (an adc main who i can queue with) ive mained, morgana blitzcrank braum lux and aniva, and i am currently mastering tahm and velkoz support, but can play a bit of aything support. send me an add; ohlookitspip

replies.body: im a silver ADC main, but can also jungle/support
Im a jinx main but i can play basically all the adcs. ive sent you a request so if your up for a duo im keen

Hey, Im a kalista main with 110k Mastery points and im kinda looking for a support main to climb outta elo hell. I have voice comms too. realistically if you can play alistar or something with HEAVY cc i can hopefully carry the game.
